General.Name: Shanghai Chlor-Alkali Chemical Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Chlor-Alkali Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical products in China and internationally. The company offers caustic soda and chlorine products, as well as polyvinyl chloride plastic resins and products. Shanghai Chlor-Alkali Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.
